Description: Important messages should be marked with star symbol
the user should easily create a new letter
letter text should be edited in the new message window
images must be attached to the letter
links should be attached to the letter
the letter should be added to drafts
letters must be sorted by importance
letters must be added to categories
the letter should be added to spam
All letters must be highlighted with one button
Read letters should be marked with a different color
Letters must be deleted in the trash
